content:
I missed the monday deadline for R5 ballot, due to ... well... I really don't know why my first pull-request was a disaster. I have re-created the pull-request and have succeeded to get a pull-request to succeed.
https://github.com/HL7/fhir/pull/1253
I request that this pull-request be considered and accepted for the upcoming R5 ballot.
is the fhir core locked? I see others merging in pull -requests.
Right now, we're in the QA period.
so, what does that mean? I understood it to be that no more commits were allowed from CRs. Hence why I did not merge my pull-request
Fixing quality issues (spelling, grammar, formatting, etc. ) is fine. Substantive changes should now require Grahame's approval.
